engine.sanders.agent
Class PopUpAgent

java.lang.Object
  engine.agent.Agent
      engine.sanders.agent.PopUpAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
PopUp, TReceiver
public class PopUpAgent
extends Agent
implements PopUp, TReceiver

This is an agent class that controls the raising, lowering, loading, and releasing of a pop up in the glassline factory

Author:
Justin

Constructor Detail

PopUpAgent

public PopUpAgent(ConveyorFamily cf,
                  Transducer transducer,
                  java.lang.Integer index,
                  java.lang.Integer cfIndex,
                  java.lang.Integer workstationIndex,
                  TChannel workstation,
                  java.lang.String name)
Constructor for PopUpAgent

Parameters:
cf - parent ConveyorFamilyContainer
transducer - transducer that allows communication with the GUI
index - the index of the conveyor within the factory
cfIndex - the index of the conveyor family/workstation that the pop up belongs to
recipe - the code that corresponds with a part that would be machined at the workstation tied to the parent ConveyorFamilyContainer
workstation - the channel that the pop should listen to to know when the robot finishes loading a part
name - the name of the agent

msgRobotReady

public void msgRobotReady(Robot robot,
                          java.lang.Integer index)
Tells the pop up that there is a robot that is ready. The pop up checks to see if it is a new robot. If it is, it adds it. If not, it changed the robots state to "available".

Specified by:
msgRobotReady in interface PopUp
Parameters:
robot - a pointer to the robot that sent the message
index - the index of the robot

msgNextPartNeedsProcessing

public void msgNextPartNeedsProcessing(boolean needsProcessing)
This message informs the pop up if the part waiting on the sensor before it needs to be processed at its workstation

Parameters:
needsProcessing - signifies if the part needs to be processed

pickAndExecuteAnAction

public boolean pickAndExecuteAnAction()
Description copied from class: Agent
Agents must implement this scheduler to perform any actions appropriate for the current state. Will be called whenever a state change has occurred, and will be called repeated as long as it returns true.

Specified by:
pickAndExecuteAnAction in class Agent
Returns:
true if some action was executed that might have changed the state.

setConveyor

public void setConveyor(Conveyor conveyor)
sets the conveyor that is inside the same conveyor family so the pop up knows who to tell when its state changes

Parameters:
conveyor - the conveyor that is in the same conveyor family
